description: Mobile techniques used by TianySpy, ATT&CK software S1056 (v1.0)
name: TianySpy (S1056)

techniques.comment: [TianySpy](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S1056) can steal information via malicious JavaScript.(Citation: trendmicro_tianyspy_0122)
[TianySpy](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S1056) can exfiltrate collected user data, including credentials and authorized cookies, via email.(Citation: trendmicro_tianyspy_0122)
[TianySpy](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S1056) can utilize WebViews to display fake authentication pages that capture user credentials.(Citation: trendmicro_tianyspy_0122)
[TianySpy](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S1056) has encrypted C2 details, email addresses, and passwords.(Citation: trendmicro_tianyspy_0122)
[TianySpy](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S1056) can install malicious configurations on iPhones to allow malware to be installed via Ad Hoc distribution.(Citation: trendmicro_tianyspy_0122)
[TianySpy](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S1056) can check to see if Wi-Fi is enabled.(Citation: trendmicro_tianyspy_0122)
[TianySpy](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S1056) can check to see if WiFi is enabled.(Citation: trendmicro_tianyspy_0122)
[TianySpy](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S1056) can check to see if Wi-Fi is enabled.(Citation: trendmicro_tianyspy_0122)
